Typealiases.html#/s:22JJFloatingActionBu.name: JJItemAngle
Typealiases.html#/s:22JJFloatingActionBu.abstract: A typealias representing a closure that calculates the angle for each item in a floating action button.

Protocols/JJFloatingActionButtonDelegate.name: floatingActionButtonWillOpen(_:)
Protocols/JJFloatingActionButtonDelegate.abstract: Is called before opening animation. Button state is .opening.

Protocols/JJFloatingActionButtonDelegate.name: floatingActionButtonDidOpen(_:)
Protocols/JJFloatingActionButtonDelegate.abstract: Is called after opening animation. Button state is .opened.

Protocols/JJFloatingActionButtonDelegate.name: floatingActionButtonWillClose(_:)
Protocols/JJFloatingActionButtonDelegate.abstract: Is called before closing animation. Button state is .closing.

Protocols/JJFloatingActionButtonDelegate.name: floatingActionButtonDidClose(_:)
Protocols/JJFloatingActionButtonDelegate.abstract: Is called after closing animation. Button state is .closed.

Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.name: leading
Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.abstract: Place the title at the leading edge of the circle view.

Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.name: trailing
Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.abstract: Place the title at the trailing edge of the circle view.

Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.name: left
Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.abstract: Place the title at the left edge of the circle view.

Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.name: right
Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.abstract: Place the title at the right edge of the circle view.

Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.name: top
Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.abstract: Place the title at the top edge of the circle view.

Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.name: bottom
Enums/JJActionItemTitlePosition.html#/c:.abstract: Place the title at the bottom edge of the circle view.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: delegate
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The delegate object for the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: items
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The list of action items.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: buttonColor
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The background color of the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: highlightedButtonColor
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The background color of the floating action button with highlighted state.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: buttonImage
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The image displayed on the button by default.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: buttonImageSize
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The size of the image view.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: buttonImageColor
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The tint color of the image view.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: buttonDiameter
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The default diameter of the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: itemSizeRatio
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The size of an action item in relation to the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/s:2.name: buttonAnimationConfiguration
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/s:2.abstract: The opening style of the floating action button itself.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/s:2.name: itemAnimationConfiguration
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/s:2.abstract: The opening style of the action items.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: handleSingleActionDirectly
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: When enabled and only one action item is added, the floating action button will not open,

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: closeAutomatically
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: When enabled, the floating action button will close after an action item was tapped,

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: buttonState
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The current state of the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: circleView
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The round background view of the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: imageView
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The image view of the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: overlayView
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The overlay view.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: init(frame:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated floating action button object with the specified frame rectangle.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: init(coder:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: init(image:action:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated floating action button object with the specified image and action.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: open(animated:completion:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Open the floating action button and show all action items.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: close(animated:completion:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Close the floating action button and hide all action items.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: display(inView:bottomInset:trailingInset:safeAreaInset:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Add floating action button to a given superview and place in trailing bottom corner.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: display(inViewController:bottomInset:trailingInset:safeAreaInset:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Add floating action button to a view of a given view controller and place in trailing bottom corner.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: addItem(title:image:action:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Add an action item with title, image and action to the list of items.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: addItem(_:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Add an action item to the list of items.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: removeItem(_:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Remove an action item from the list of items.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: removeItem(at:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Remove and returns the action item at the specified position in the list of items.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: configureDefaultItem(_:)
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Calls the given closure on each item that is or was added to the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: enabledItems
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: All items that will be shown when floating action button is opened.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: isHighlighted
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the action button draws a highlight.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: intrinsicContentSize
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The natural size for the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: updateConstraints()
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Updates constraints for the view.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: didMoveToSuperview()
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the view that its superview changed.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: shadowColor
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The shadow color of the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: shadowOffset
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The shadow offset of the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: shadowOpacity
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The shadow opacity of the floating action button.

Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.name: shadowRadius
Classes/JJFloatingActionButton.html#/c:@.abstract: The shadow radius of the floating action button.

Classes/JJCircleView.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: highlightedColor
Classes/JJCircleView.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The color of the circle when highlighted. Default is nil.

Classes/JJCircleView.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: isHighlighted
Classes/JJCircleView.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the circle view draws a highlight.

Classes/JJCircleView.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: init(coder:)
Classes/JJCircleView.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/JJCircleView.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: draw(_:)
Classes/JJCircleView.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: Draws the receiver’s image within the passed-in rectangle

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: action
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The action that is executed when the item is tapped.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: callAction()
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: Calls the action on the action item.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: buttonColor
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The color of action item circle view.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: highlightedButtonColor
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The color of action item circle view with highlighted state.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: buttonImageColor
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The tint color of the image view.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: titleLabel
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The title label of the item. Can be configured as needed.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: imageView
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The image view of the item. Can be configured as needed.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: circleView
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The background circle of the item. Can be configured as needed.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: titlePosition
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The position of the title label. Default is .leading.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: titleSpacing
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The position of the title label. Default is -1.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: imageSize
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: The size of the image view. Default is (0, 0).

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: init(coder:)
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@CM@JJFloat.name: didMoveToSuperview()
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@CM@JJFloat.abstract: Tells the view that its superview changed.

Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@CM@JJFloat.name: isHighlighted
Classes/JJActionItem.html#/c:@CM@JJFloat.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the action item draws a highlight.

Classes/JJItemPreparation.html#/c:@M@JJF.name: prepare
Classes/JJItemPreparation.html#/c:@M@JJF.abstract: A closure that prepares a given action item for animation.

Classes/JJItemPreparation.html#/c:@M@JJF.name: init(prepare:)
Classes/JJItemPreparation.html#/c:@M@JJF.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated item preparation object with given prepare closure.

Classes/JJItemLayout.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: layout
Classes/JJItemLayout.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: A closure that defines the layout of given action items relative to an action button.

Classes/JJItemLayout.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: init(layout:)
Classes/JJItemLayout.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated item layout object with given layout closure.

Classes/JJItemLayout.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: verticalLine(withInterItemSpacing:firstItemSpacing:)
Classes/JJItemLayout.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: Returns an item layout object that places the items in a vertical line with given inter item spacing.

Classes/JJItemLayout.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.name: circular(withRadius:angleForItem:)
Classes/JJItemLayout.html#/c:@M@JJFloati.abstract: Returns an item layout object that places the items in a circle around the action button with given radius.

Classes/JJItemAnimationConfiguration.htm.name: itemLayout
Classes/JJItemAnimationConfiguration.htm.abstract: Defines the layout of the acton items when opened.

Classes/JJItemAnimationConfiguration.htm.name: closedState
Classes/JJItemAnimationConfiguration.htm.abstract: Configures the items before opening. The change from open to closed state is animated.

Classes/JJItemAnimationConfiguration.htm.name: openState
Classes/JJItemAnimationConfiguration.htm.abstract: Configures the items for open state. The change from open to closed state is animated.

Classes/JJItemAnimationConfiguration.htm.name: angleForItem(at:numberOfItems:actionButton:)
Classes/JJItemAnimationConfiguration.htm.abstract: Calculates the angle for the item at the specified index in the floating action button.

Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.name: init(withStyle:)
Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated button animation configuration object with the specified style.

Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.name: angle
Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.abstract: The angle in radian the button will rotate to when opening.

Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.name: image
Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.abstract: The image button will transition to when opening.

Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.name: rotation(toAngle:)
Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.abstract: Returns a button animation configuration that rotates the button image by given angle.

Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.name: transition(toImage:)
Classes/JJButtonAnimationConfiguration.h.abstract: Returns a button animation configuration that transitions to a given image.

Classes/JJAnimationSettings.html#/c:@M@J.name: init(duration:dampingRatio:initialVelocity:interItemDelay:)
Classes/JJAnimationSettings.html#/c:@M@J.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated animation settings object with specified parameters.

Classes/JJCircleView.html.name: JJCircleView
Classes/JJCircleView.html.abstract: A colored circle with an highlighted state

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
